{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = WatchGuard AP-300.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = WatchGuard AP300 Access Point |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.guardsite.com/AP300.asp |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = WatchGuard_AP300 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = WatchGuard |model = AP300 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.0.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/30/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/WatchGuard_AP300 |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q6G-AP300 |icid = 4657A-AP300 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 7016A0886008 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9558; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- 720 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;FL256SAIFRO; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU64M16HG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F |oui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;OpenWrt Kamikaze r20146;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.25 |pwr_poe_type = af/at |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J10 |jtag = yes,, 14-pad header,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = PoE in |addchip = 3A 28V Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54331;;1;,,, 802.3at PoE Interface and DC/DC Controller;TI;TPS23754;;1;,,, 13A 30V Single N-Channel Logic Level MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS6670A;;2;,,, 1A Schottky Bridge Rectifier;Central Semiconductor;CBRHDSH1-100;;2;,,, 2.4GHz High-Gain Power Amplifier;Silicon Storage Technology;SST12LP15A;;3;,,, 5mA Single Channel Phototransistor OptoCoupler;Vishay Semiconductor;TCMT1107;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 12/31/2019 |fccapprovdate = 12/01/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL (internal) |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "7016A0886008 V1.00" is silkscreened on the board. {{See also|WatchGuard AP100|WatchGuard AP200|Senao CAP4200AG|Senao}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Qualcomm Atheros]]'' QCA9558 [[MIPS 74K]] (@720MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 32MB SPI NOR Flash *WiFi: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 (802.11bgn) :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 (802.11an/ac) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power: 12V, 1.25A via barrel or 802.3af/at PoE
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.watchguard.com/help/docs/hardware%20guides/AP300_Hardware_Guide.pdf Hardware Guide]
